name: Parse modbus
template:
{
    "Outdoor temperature":  {{ payload.data.1 }},
    "Supply air temperature": {{ payload.data.2 }},
    "Exhaust air temperature": {{ payload.data.3 }},
    "Waste air temperature": {{ payload.data.4 }},
    "Water temperature": {{ payload.data.5 }},
    "Heat Recovery Wheel temperature": {{ payload.data.6 }},
    "Room temperature": {{ payload.data.7 }},
    "Supply pressure x0.1Pa Valid only if pressure sensor connected": {{ payload.data.11 }},
    "Exhaust pressure x0.1Pa Valid only if pressure sensor connected": {{ payload.data.12 }},
    "Relative humidity x0.1% Valid only if RH sensor connected": {{ payload.data.13 }},
    "Carbon dioxide PPM Valid only if CO2 sensor conneced": {{ payload.data.14 }},
    "Filter days left": {{ payload.data.19 }},
    "Current weektimer program": {{ payload.data.20 }},
    "Current fan speed": {{ payload.data.21 }},
    "Current supply fan step": {{ payload.data.22 }},
    "Current exhaust fan step": {{ payload.data.23 }},
    "Current supply fan power %": {{ payload.data.24 }},
    "Current exhaust fan power %": {{ payload.data.25 }},
    "Current supply fan speed RPM": {{ payload.data.26 }},
    "Current exhaust fan speed RPM": {{ payload.data.27 }},
    "Current heating power": {{ payload.data.28 }},
    "Current heat/cold recovery power": {{ payload.data.29 }},
    "Current cooling power": {{ payload.data.30 }},
    "Supply fan control voltage": {{ payload.data.31 }},
    "Exhaust fan control voltage": {{ payload.data.32 }},
    "outdoor": {{ payload.data.1 }}
 }

name: Parse modbus
Parse modbus
template:
{
    "User fan speed": {{ payload.data.0 }},
    "Temperature setpoint": {{ payload.data.1 }},
    "Supply fan speed EC": {{ payload.data.2 }},
    "Exhaust fan speed EC": {{ payload.data.3 }},
    "Min exhaust fan speed EC": {{ payload.data.4 }},
    "Mod exhaust fan speed EC": {{ payload.data.5 }},
    "Max exhaust fan speed EC": {{ payload.data.6 }},
    "Min supply temperature": {{ payload.data.9 }},
    "Max supply temperature": {{ payload.data.10 }},
    "Regulation mode": {{ payload.data.11 }},
    "SNC indoor-outdoor diff. Limit": {{ payload.data.12 }},
    "SNC exhaust low limit": {{ payload.data.13 }},
    "SNC exhaust high limit": {{ payload.data.14 }},
    "SNC enable": {{ payload.data.15 }},
    "Freeze protection limit": {{ payload.data.16 }},
    "CO2 limit": {{ payload.data.19 }},
    "CO2 interval": {{ payload.data.20 }},
    "CO2 ramp": {{ payload.data.21 }},
    "RH limit": {{ payload.data.22 }},
    "RH interval": {{ payload.data.23 }},
    "RH ramp": {{ payload.data.24 }},
    "Boost speed": {{ payload.data.25 }},
    "Boost duration": {{ payload.data.26 }},
    "Overpressure duration": {{ payload.data.27 }},
    "Electric heater": {{ payload.data.50 }}
}

name: true/false
true/false
true/false
true/false
DateTimeObject
Overpressure mode
Boost mode
Away mode
Temperature setpoint
when hass is initiated values is updated
Outdoor temperature
template:
{
    "device": {
        "identifiers": ["ftx_heru"],
        "name": "FTX data", 
        "manufacturer": "stberg",
        "model": "Node red flow",
        "sw_version": "1.0"
    },
    "device_class": "temperature",
    "state_class": "measurement",
    "name": "Outdoor temperature",
    "state_topic": "ftx/data",
    "unit_of_measurement": "C",
    "unique_id": "Outdoor temperature",
    "value_template": " {{value_json['Outdoor temperature']}} ",
    "platform": "mqtt",
    "icon": "mdi:home-thermometer-outline"
}

name: Boost
template:
{
    "device": {
        "identifiers": ["ftx_heru"],
        "name": "FTX data", 
        "manufacturer": "stberg",
        "model": "Node red flow",
        "sw_version": "1.0"
    },

    "command_topic": "ftx/Boostmode/set",
    "payload_off": false,
    "payload_on": true,
    "state_topic": "ftx/Boostmode/state",
    "name": "Boost mode",
    "unique_id": "Boost mode",
    "value_template": " {{value_json.value}} ",
    "platform": "mqtt",
    "icon": "mdi:fan-plus"
}

name: Temperature setpoint
template:
{
    "device": {
        "identifiers": [
            "ftx_heru"
        ],
        "name": "FTX data",
        "manufacturer": "stberg",
        "model": "Node red flow",
        "sw_version": "1.0"
    },
    "name": "Temperature setpoint",
    "unique_id": "Temperature setpoint",
    "platform": "mqtt",
    "command_topic": "ftx/Temperaturesetpoint/set",
    "state_topic": "ftx/Temperaturesetpoint/state",
    "value_template": " {{value_json.value}} ",
    "device_class": "temperature",
    "min": 15,
    "max": 25,
    "mode": "slider",
    "step": 1,
    "unit_of_measurement": "C"
}
